decision_conditions: Please see information belowEnvironment Agency PositionFollowing our review of the above, we are not in a position to recommend that condition 6 (contamination) is discharged.Condition 6 (Contamination) The information submitted refers to a Groundwater Monitoring and Groundwatersummary report, which discusses several remaining factors to be addressed including our requirement for further groundwater monitoring. As far as can be seen, this document has not been provided for our review.Additionally, further evidence that the risk is being ameliorated to a suitable level in a groundwater. No further evidence has been provided for our review as part of this application.Information submitted pursuant to Condition 5 (Backfilled Materials) is acceptable subject to addressing the points above.
